allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: fix camera stream leak, remove dead code, improve type safety

- Fix CameraView stream not being released on unmount \(useRef + cancelled flag\)
- Extract duplicate VenusLogo into shared component \(components/ui/VenusLogo.tsx\)
- Remove dead code: handleClearApiKey, unused process.env defines, unused CSS
- Move Header/Footer outside App function to prevent re-creation on render
- Replace all catch\(err: any\) with catch\(err: unknown\) + proper narrowing
- Add JSON.parse error handling in geminiService
- Enable strict mode in tsconfig, add include/exclude, remove unused options
- Add @types/react and @types/react-dom devDependencies
- Sync CLAUDE.md with actual codebase \(models, structure, API key flow\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
